PDF Server Deployment

Our Enterprise PDF solution allows you to deploy our PDF server within your own environment. To set up your server, please click on the following button to go to our online PDF Server deployment instructions.

PDF Server Deployment Instructions

Deployment Code

Once your deployment is set up, you can run the following Docker command to spin up your new server:

docker run -itd \
  -e "LICENSE_KEY=[LICENSE KEY WITH pdfServer SCOPE]" \
  -e "FORMIO_S3_BUCKET=[YOUR S3 BUCKET NAME]" \
  -e "FORMIO_S3_REGION=[YOUR S3 REGION]" \
  -e "FORMIO_S3_KEY=[YOUR S3 AUTH KEY]" \
  -e "FORMIO_S3_SECRET=[YOUR S3 AUTH SECRET]" \
  --restart unless-stopped \
  --name formio-files-core \
  -p 80:4005 \
  formio/formio-files-core;
